thread.title: Kim Kardashian says she made Lamar Odom smile
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian says she made Lamar Odom smile - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Kim Kardashian says she made Lamar Odom smile
text:
Kim Kardashian/via Twitter Kim Kardashian posted on social media that she’s "so happy" she could make Lamar Odom smile. Kim Kardashian believes the prayers of Lamar Odom's fans are helping him recover.
The reality star shared an uplifting message about her estranged brother in law early Sunday morning — six days after the former NBA star was found unconscious at a Las Vegas brothel.
" Kardashian posted on Instagram. "I believe in the power of prayer and positive energy! Thank you all for your prayers!"
The TV personality added that she and half-sister Kendall Jenner had witnessed Odom's encouraging progress first-hand.
David Becker/Getty Images Kim Kardashian (right) is seen leaving the Sunrise Hospital earlier in the week with Kylie Jenner (left) and Kourtney Kardashian (center). "Lammy- I'm so happy Kendall & I could make you smile today!" she wrote. "God is good!"
Kardashian, Jenner and their mother Kris Jenner flew to Las Vegas on Saturday to be with Odom, who is currently being cared for at the Sunrise Hospital and Medical Center. The trio joined Odom's estranged wife Khloé Kardashian, who has reportedly not left Las Vegas since Odom was admitted into the hospital early last week.
Odom emerged from his coma on Friday after four days when he reportedly looked up at Khloe Kardashian and said "hey baby," then gave her a thumbs up and went back to sleep, according to E! News.
Jason Merritt/Getty Images Odom (second to left) has featured on “Keeping Up with the Kardashians” due to his relationship with Khloe Kardashian (fourth from left). Doctors have been fighting to save the ex-Los Angeles Laker, who has been suffering from failing organs. A source told TMZ last week that Odom had evidence of cocaine in his system and track marks on his arms.
Odom's recent improvements have lifted the spirits of the Kardashian family, according to People , but he still has a ways to go.
"He is still in the ICU, is receiving oxygen and sleeps a lot," a source told the magazine. "He is not talking, but seems to understand when Khloé and the medical staff speak to him."
Related Stories Lamar Odom 'way, way better,' talking with family members Lamar Odom out of coma, breathing on his own
